graphql.query:
query {
  storeConfig {
    enabledisable
    type
    bar_position
    box_position
    behaviour
    auto_hide_after
    auto_accept
    expire
    onscroll
    show
    custom_message
    model_title
    custom_accept
    custom_close
    custom_more_info
    cms_page
    font_family
    model_text_align
    model_title_size
    model_message_size
    model_border
    continer_top_border
    container_bottom_border
    container_border_color
    header_background_color
    header_font_color
    header_bottom_border_color
    footer_top_border_color
    accept_button_background_color
    close_button_background_color
    policy_button_background_color
    close_button_color
    privace_policy_color
    accept_button_color
    model_title_color
 }
}
